channel.title: I lost my skills?
channel.description: Recently my computer broke down, family went into technacal problems with bills(power got cut off) for 2 months. we lived with my other falks(m y brothers) and well...all i can say is that i now use what i use for my imagination.... lol - by adding any random things. [IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/6g1awko.png[/img][br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 07:56:49 PM[/size][hr]I did this one today...[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 07:57:37 PM[/size][hr]ffs post god dammit...all those view & 3 days passed by...

item.title: I lost my skills?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Too dark… Too negative. The colors don’t look good with all that negative space. Put a light source on the bottom/top to draw attention to the sprite. What ever those purple things are, you should add more smaller ones, and some disintegrated ones. That would add a decent flow and more texture, and something easier to look at. This kinda hurts my eyes considering I don’t know what the thing in the middle is.

Read full topic

item.title: I lost my skills?
item.dc:creator: @HPC_Jarod HPC_Jarod
item.description:
@HPC_Jarod wrote:

[quote=“WhiteShadow, post:2, topic:113892”]It could use a lot more things…

Add a border, I love borders, it makes simple signatures look more awesome. Higher the text a little.[/quote]

TY (to everyone else who commented too), Its been a while since i last made art. I’ve been looking at other signature details seeing what makes them to perfect. I see now, people prefer multiple graphic effects then 2 or 3 of them…

Read full topic

Add a border, I love borders, it makes simple signatures look more awesome. Higher the text a little.
